page.title: 16 MR.H.LEATHLEY
page.content: Has anything else changed about Masham? "They tarmaced the market square that was all cobbles and gravel.There used to be a fair at Masham.They had it on one side of the market square one year and on the other the next."He was asked if he thought there was anything wrong with Masham."Not really _ just to many 'outsiders." He used to go to the pictures twice a week to see Magic Lantern shows and silent movies and he liked playing down on the 'rec' best. It used to be nothing but wild rhubarb near the pavilion.Did he ever go and play in the river? "Oh yes! We've even sledged and ice skated on it when it was frozen over in the Winter.It used to creak a bit when we were on it.We weren't really scared but then you don't really think when you are young."
